extDescription.message: Ɛde mfonini/krataa a na wɔka krataa no ho kan no hyɛ krataa mmuae mu otomatik.

confirmTitle.message: Si kakra hu fa ntaaso ho

uiNoOptions.message: Seisei de, nhyehyɛe bi nni hɔ.

uiSupport.message: Wo pɛ saa kɔkɔbɔ‑kɔ so yi? Boa me kɔkɔbɔ ketewa bi mu:

uiGithubText.message: Sɛ wo pɛ sɛ wokɔka mfomso anaa nsɛmmisa bi a, kɔ me

uiBlacklistHelp.message: File a ne din bɛtene saa nsɛso yi mu biara ho no, renka ho otomatik da. Fa nsɛso baako to ahyɛnsode koro mu. Mfatoho: *.png, smime.*, *.p7s

uiWarnBlacklistLabel.message: Ka kyerɛ me sɛ sɛe ho de a, ɛnyɛ atomatik

uiConfirmLabel.message: Bisa ansa na wobɛka ntaaso ho

uiConfirmHelp.message: Akɔnkyen ketewa bi befi mu kɔsi sɛ wobɛka ntaaso ho ampa. Afidie keys: Y anaa J = Aane; N anaa Esc = Daabi.

warnBlacklistIntro.message: File yi nkyerɛwde yi renka ho otomatik da:
